__e: Is that what we call these creatures who can't control their nature, their hunger?
I'll take everything you love... starting with that little creature you've been eyeing so fondly.
You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world...
That creature isn't responsible for what happened today.
But listen, kids if this thing's really back, you best leave now while you still can.
But seeing that... thing... That is something that still wakes me in the night.
